title: STM
text:
Data Science Intern, DvSum.ai, June - Sep 2021, CA, USA


Intelligent Metadata Management Pipeline
Developed an automated pipeline for data type (primitive, semantic) detection, advanced profiling, rule-based meta data matching and quality validation, and autonomous lineage tracking.
Automated Data Science Workflow
Created an end-to-end pipeline for autonomous data cleaning, profiling, feature transformation, and code generation to streamline data science team workflows.

title: STM
text:
Competitions and Awards


US PETs (Privacy-enhancing Technolgy) Challenge, Financial Crime Prevention, 1st Place (1/60)

Designed privacy-preserving federated XGBoost using Bloomfilter for financial crime detection.
Challenge Report: US-UK PETs Challenge | Solution: Scarlet-PETs





Kaggle Predict New Medicines with BELKA, Blonde Medal (178/1950), 2024

Processed protein data for molecule representation extraction using Pandas and BELKA and developed 1D CNN model in PyTorch for protein-molecule interaction prediction.

title: Sitao Min
text:
Hi there! I am a Ph.D. candidate at Rutgers Business School, working under the supervision of Dr. Jaideep Vaidya at the Rutgers Institute of Data Science Learning and Application (Rutgers iDSLA). I hold a Master’s in Computer Science from USC and Bachelor’s in Physics from Zhejiang University, China.
My research focuses on healthcare data science, particularly missing data imputation (e.g., in distributed healthcare networks), clinical and EHR data analysis (e.g., real-world evidence (RWE)), federated learning and Synthetic Data Generation. I am passionate about developing statistical and data science methods to advance evidence-based healthcare analysis.
